journal: Journal of Diabetes and its Complications
title: Erratum to Dan Ziegler, Sally Edmundson, Irina Gurieva, Boris Mankovsky, Nikolaos Papanas, Igor Strokov. Predictors of response to treatment with actovegin for 6 months in patients with type 2 diabetes and symptomatic polyneuropathy. J Diabetes Complications 2017; 31:1181-7
